body.name: EnHomee Dresser for Bedroom with Mesh Door Tall Dressers & Chests of Drawers with 10 Fabric Drawer Morden Dresser Organizer,Metal Frame,Wood Top,for Closet,Entryway,Black 38" Wx11.81 Dx48.1 H
features: 【Dresser for Bedroom with Super Large Capacity】The bedroom dresser can meet all your organizing needs! The dressers and chests of drawers has extra storage space and can easily hold 300+ pieces of clothes and socks, freeing up tons of space in your room. Tall dresser has 6 extra-large drawers, 2 medium-sized drawers, and 2 wooden shelves. Sorting and organizing is easy! The black dresser is easy to use and is the perfect helper for organizing your room. Dresser size: 38" Wx11.81" Dx48.1" H.

【New Modern Desser with Metal Mesh Door】Multi-functional new design meets your various storage needs. The metal mesh door section of the fabric dresser organizer features two levels of storage and is made of durable, sturdy wood panels. Black dresser for bedroom is perfect for DVDs, small speakers, lamps, books, aromatherapy, clothes, and more! Tall dressers for bedroom can also be used as a cabinet for wine glasses, beverages, and snacks. The First Choice for Organizers!

【Dresser Made of Thickened & Durable & Healthy Materials】The tall dressers for bedroom is made of 1.15 g/cm³ high density and healthy cationic material and fiber wood base, very breathable and durable, each drawer can hold 14 LBS and the same hold weight as the wooden drawer. The wood top of the chest of drawers for bedroom can hold 111 LBS. The drawers push and pull smoothly and are easy to clean, wipe with a damp towel and air dry.

【Easy to Assemble for Everyone】Are you worried about not being able to assemble large dresser for bedroom? Don't worry. We provide the tools for assembly and the easiest an assembly instructions. After our assembly test, one person can easily complete the installation in less than 30 minutes. If you have any difficulty with the installation. Can any time let us know and we will help you.

【2 X Reinforced Parts & Anti-tip Kits & Adjustable Feet】Makes you more comfortable and safe to use. EnHomee's dresser for closet has 2 X reinforced parts on the back, which can the whole won't deform and collapse, and use longer than normal organizer. The tall and wide dresser organizer furniture has balanced adjustable feet that can be used on uneven floors and also protects the floor of the room from scratches. Anti-tipping parts make the bedroom dressers with drawers organizer safer to use.

【Multiple application scenarios and 1 year warranty】This contemporary style dresser for bedroom is suitable for all rooms. It can be placed in bedroom, living room, closet, entryway, dresser TV stand, apartment, dormitory, office, toy room and so on. Also we provide one year warranty, any problem about the dresser tall will be solved for you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described and what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: It looks good. It came with all the tools and pieces needed to build. Easy directions to follow. It only took about two hours to put together although I misread some directions and had to back track. Other than that I'm overall satisfied with it.Not a single complaint comes to mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We absolutely love this chest of drores. It was easy to put together and looks amazing. I have ordered more of the set. My suggestion is to get it while you can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So beautiful! Happy customer
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put it together and it looks great!This product came well packaged. I love everything about it and I really recommend. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exceptionally easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I have never had a piece of furniture go together so beautifully. Pieces FIT! Since the company includes the tools needed in with the requisite screws and bolts, it is obvious that EnHomee wants you to have success building this unit. Very good instructions although some steps had to be reviewed twice to make sure I understood them. The illustrations were extremely helpful.I had no problems. Considering I am 74 years old, that's saying alot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just how I envisioned it 😍
reviews.reviewText: It was an easy install, my 12 year old did it 🎉. It’s sturdy ( empty and filled). Tons of space, I was able to fit all of my T-shirts and leggings. And finally I love the mesh doors and have a home for my perfumes and lotions😍. (The light is excluded)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It looks exactly like wood
reviews.reviewText: Very nice lots of room perfect for few odds and ends I use it in my bedroom for my clothes works out well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like this.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one for my wife and she liked it so much she asked me to order another, I like them as well so I ordered one for myself, we have three in all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks good but not exactly as pictures portray
reviews.reviewText: I like the way the dresser looks. Fabric is taught and when fully put together it is sturdy. Though, what I do want to point out is the spacing. The pictures in the listing show full size pillows being put in the bottom drawers which, as you can see from my picture, won't actually fit. Second, the little gated portion is a nice look but small. As you can see from my iPad Air it takes up almost all the room. My personal gripes, thought I should point them out.All in all, it's a good, small, dresser. Came with all the necessary tools to put it together as well (screw driver, allen wrench, hex wrench, and all the screws came with one extra which I appreciated). Did it all by hand and, if you're curious, I chose to not mount mine to the wall.
